quests.desc: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, attempt to move north. After that, take a trip north. After that, attempt to venture west. After that, try to go south. That done, attempt to travel south. And then, go south. Once you accomplish that, attempt to take a trip east. And then, try to venture south. After that, attempt to venture east. Following that, close the portmanteau inside the workshop. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Ah, the workshop. This is some kind of workshop, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can see a portmanteau. Wow, check out the price tag that the portmanteau's owner still hasn't taken off! Eighty dollars![if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The portmanteau is empty![end if] You see an armchair. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the armchair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. An usual one.

 You see a board. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You are in a cellar. It seems to be pretty normal here. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You scan the room for a stand, and you find a stand. [if there is something on the s_2]On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_2]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're now in the studio.

 You can see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker close by.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bar.

 You see a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You move on, clearly furious with your TextWorld experience.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a vault. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. An usual kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchenette. A typical one.

 You can make out a rectangular safe. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The rectangular safe contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The rectangular safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a chair. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]The chair appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You arrive in a shower. A typical one.

 You can make out a counter. The counter is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You're now in the salon.

 You can make out a safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've entered a closet. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You see a shelf. Now why would someone leave that there? [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the shelf, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the shelf.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bathroom. A typical one.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
I just think it's awesome that you're in a garage now.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Of every attic you could have sauntered into, you had to saunter into a normal one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You see a cabinet.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a rack. The rack is usual.[if there is something on the s_7] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_7], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. An ordinary one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 [if c_5 is locked]A locked[else if c_5 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] case, which looks standard, is here.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The case contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The case is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a formless box.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The formless box contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The formless box is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You are in a laundry place. A typical one.

 You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a bench. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_9] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookery. An usual one.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. A standard one.



There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a dish-pit. Let's see what's in here.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fudge scented box.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The fudge scented box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The fudge scented box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a freezer.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The freezer is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the playroom. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: The portal looks durable. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: The door looks noble. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portmanteau
infos.desc: The portmanteau looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: rectangular safe
infos.desc: The rectangular safe looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: formless box
infos.desc: The formless box looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: fudge scented box
infos.desc: The fudge scented box looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: freezer
infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: The stick of butter looks delectable.

infos.name: candy bar
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: that's a normal sandwich!

infos.name: loaf of bread
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

infos.name: formless keycard
infos.desc: The formless keycard looks useful

infos.name: fudge scented latchkey
infos.desc: The fudge scented latchkey is weighty.

infos.name: bug
infos.desc: The bug would seem to be to fit in here

infos.name: staple
infos.desc: The staple looks out of place here

infos.name: armchair
infos.desc: The armchair is undependable.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is stable.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is an unstable piece of trash.

infos.name: bookshelf
infos.desc: The bookshelf is unstable.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is undependable.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is balanced.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is reliable.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is durable.

infos.name: bench
infos.desc: The bench is wobbly.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is stable.

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: The legume looks tasty.

infos.name: grape
infos.desc: that's a standard grape!

infos.name: licorice strip
infos.desc: that's a normal licorice strip!

infos.name: cucumber
infos.desc: that's an usual cucumber!

infos.name: rectangular keycard
infos.desc: The metal of the rectangular keycard is brushed.

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The key looks useful

infos.name: ladle
infos.desc: The ladle is well-used.

infos.name: tv
infos.desc: The tv seems to fit in here

infos.name: tablet
infos.desc: The tablet appears to be well matched to everything else here

infos.name: broom
infos.desc: The broom is dirty.

infos.name: stapler
infos.desc: The stapler appears well matched to everything else here

infos.name: disk
infos.desc: The disk appears to be well matched to everything else here

infos.desc: The top hat would seem to be well matched to everything else here

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First off, head north. After that, make an attempt to go north. With that accomplished, try to move west. And then, attempt to go south. And then, make an attempt to go to the south. After that, go to the south. Then, go to the east. Next, attempt to take a trip south. Then, try to head east. After that, close the portmanteau in the workshop. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
